thread.title: I’ll Be Speaking at The Ohio State University Next Week
thread.title_full: I’ll Be Speaking at The Ohio State University Next Week

author: Hemant Mehta
title: I’ll Be Speaking at The Ohio State University Next Week
text:
« The Most Hated Woman In America : A Review of Netflix’s Film About Atheist Madalyn Murray O’Hair About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
